keysOnPage.title: Key on this page
keysOnPage.text:
⚠️ IMPORTANT: This website NEVER stores your secret key!

The secret key displayed here exists only in your browser (lokal im Arbeitsspeicher). Once you reload or leave the page, it is irretrievably lost.

Copy or note down the secret key immediately after generation before closing the page.

Verification: You can use the browser developer tools (F12 → Network) to verify that no secret key is transmitted externally. Only signed transactions are sent, never your secret key.

secureKeys.title: Secure secret key
secureKeys.text:
The public key can be safely shared – it is like an account number.

The secret key grants access to your account. Treat it like a password:
• NEVER store it in cloud services, emails, or insecure notes
• Write it down on paper or use a hardware wallet
• Create multiple backups and store them in secure, separate locations
• If the secret key is lost, access to the account is permanently lost

multisigSection.title: Multisig (Mehrfachsignatur)
multisigSection.text:
With multisig, you can define multiple signatories for your account. Transactions then require signatures from multiple keys (multisig).

Advantages:
• Enhanced security (security)
• Shared accounts (shared accounts)
• Emergency recovery (emergency recovery)

CAUTION: Test multisig on the testnet first before deploying it on the mainnet! Incorrect configuration can result in losing access to the account.
